space_paste_original_recipe.description: Traditional community recipe combining nutmeg with synergistic spices and nuts

nutmeg.notes: Ground from whole nutmeg - freshly ground is essential

almonds.purpose: Fat content aids absorption, benzaldehyde compounds

raw_pistachios.notes: Can be swapped for chocolate in improved versions

black_pepper.mechanism: CYP3A4 inhibitor, P-glycoprotein inhibitor, piperidine source

administration.parachuting: Wrap thick paste in rice paper to avoid taste
administration.chocolate_method: Fold into tempered chocolate at 92°F for palatability

community_improvements.weight_ratios: Use weight measurements instead of volume for consistency

chocolate_substitution.method: Temper chocolate, fold in space paste at 92°F until even blend
chocolate_substitution.benefit: Much more palatable, easier to consume larger doses

preparation_notes: Recipe is very hard to swallow without modifications
Maple syrup alone doesn't solve palatability
Requires significant liquid to wash down

why_this_recipe_works.nutmeg: Primary source of myristicin, elemicin, 5-methoxyeugenol - three methoxy patterns
why_this_recipe_works.cinnamon: Depletes glutathione, removes 'brake' on CYP1A2 inhibition
why_this_recipe_works.black_pepper: CYP3A4 inhibition blocks escape pathway, provides piperidine for adduct formation
why_this_recipe_works.fats_from_nuts: Essential for absorption of lipophilic compounds

missing_elements_from_full_protocol.coffee: No CYP1A2 induction phase - could add for enhanced effect
missing_elements_from_full_protocol.17bHSD2_inducers: No gallic acid, vitamin D3, vitamin A

enhanced_space_paste_protocol.description: Theoretical improvement combining space paste with full oilahuasca protocol

additions: Green tea extract or EGCG 400mg (SULT inhibition)

phase_3_amine_provision.timing: 3+ hours before OR at time of dosing
options: Black pepper tea (filtered) at dosing time (direct piperidine)

warnings: Onset: 2-8 hours delayed - do not redose
Toxicity: Nutmeg toxic at high doses (>10g)
Drug interactions: CYP inhibition affects all medications

reddit_discussion_notes.community_experience: Recipe considered difficult to consume but effective
reddit_discussion_notes.historical_note: One of the earliest documented community oilahuasca formulations on Reddit
